summary: small house in the east of whiterun much bigger inside!!
descriptionHtml:
English: Comment and rate!
 
>>Update 1.1<<
massive interior lightning fix!!

>>The mod is in german but if there are enough people i can make a small translation for all of the chests etc.<<

Let me present you my first house mod called \"Schwarzwacht\". Located in the east of Whiterun there is also a Mapmarker!
The house looks quite small but its much bigger inside so dont trust your eyes. 

>>> If you want to have a base with all of your stuff, all what you need in a clean and tidy way donwload this mod!! <<<

House contains:
All of the labs have their own containers (which dont respawn!) if you want to tidy up everything but its named in german...

House contains
-Alchemy Lab
-Enchantment Lab
-Forge
-Grindstone
-Workbench
-Smelter
-Tanner rack (dunnow the correct word for it iÂ´m sorry)
-Cooking fire

House also contains:
-Mercant for alchemy ingredients
-Bed
-\"Sevret room\" with all god shrines including Nocturnal
-Much named containers to put your stuff in a tidy way!

My english sucks i hope you could understand what i tried to say. Have fun with the mod and give me a feedback if you want to
greetings Dunkleseele
author: Dunkleseele
